overview: Our story begins on a chicken farm in the Karoo. Loud and obnoxious, Clucky who wakes all of the chickens up tries his best to look after the grumpy prize chicken, Oom. Oom gets very upset by Cluckyâ€™s antics and snaps at him, causing him to leave the farm. The following day Oom searches for his friend and takes the risk to venture out of the farm.
title: The Other Side
